title: Relevant points on the graph
text: Find the y-intercept of the line and another point on located on the line.

title: Y-intercept and Point
text: The y-intercept is $$(0,-5)$$ and the hints will use $$(3,-1)$$ as another point.

title: Slope
text: Find the slope by counting the rise and run. The slope is calculated like this: $$\frac{y2-y1}{x2-x1}$$ where x1 and y1 are the values of one and x2 and y2 are the valus of the second point.

title: Slope Value
text: The slope of the line is $$\frac{4}{3}$$. Elimate multiple choice options without this slope.

title: Substitute
text: Substitute the values into $$y=mx+b$$, where $$m$$ is the calculated slope and $$b$$ is the y-value of the y-intercept.
